DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability E5555 Japanese subject coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-Blind Study E5555 Japanese Subjects With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . 45 80 year old ( time inform consent ) . 2 . Male female ( female childbearing potential must use contraception ) . 3 . Confirmed coronary artery disease . 4 . All subject must receive aspirin ( 75 325 mg ) . 1 . Unwilling unable provide inform consent . 2 . History acquire congenital bleeding disorder , coagulopathy , platelet disorder . 3 . Recent trauma major surgery . 4 . Evidence active pathological bleeding history bleed gastrointestinal genitourinary , unless cause definitely correct . 5 . History intracranial bleed history hemorrhagic retinopathy . 6 . New York Heart Association class III IV congestive heart failure . 7 . Pregnant lactating woman .
